<<<<<<< HEAD
The Kings Maiesties letters pattents to Sir William Erskin and Iohn Meldrum, for the lighthouse at Winterton England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I) James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
3 leaves.
By W. Jones, [London : 1618]
For 50-year patent to levy shipping fees to pay for lighthouse construction and maintenance. Imprint information from STC (2nd ed.). "Witnes our selfe at Westminster the 18 day of Feb. in our 15 yeare of our Raigne of England, France and Ireland and of Scotland the 51." Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
=======
The Kings Maiesties letters pattents to Sir William Erskin and Iohn Meldrum, for the lighthouse at Winterton England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I) James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
3 leaves.
By W. Jones, [London : 1618]
For 50-year patent to levy shipping fees to pay for lighthouse construction and maintenance. Imprint information from STC (2nd ed.). "Witnes our selfe at Westminster the 18 day of Feb. in our 15 yeare of our Raigne of England, France and Ireland and of Scotland the 51." Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
W. Jones
